name: Konrad Gardy
review: Harry Is One Of The Best People I Have Ever Worked With. His Excellent Work Ethic, Unstoppable Dedication And Mind Full Of Great Ideas Make Him A Unique Person That Is Extremely Hard To Find. He Always Finds New Ideas And Ways To Optimize Projects, Constantly Improves Himself, And His Hunger For Knowledge Can't Be Stopped. Harry Is Hands Down A Priceless Addition To Any Project And Organization He Joins.

name: Finley Martin
role: Student | Programmer | Graphical Designer | Full Stack Developer.
review: Personally, I Have Worked Alongside Harry As A Co-Worker Or Under Harry On Several Projects Such As Games & Websites. I Can Vouch For His Exceptional Abilities In Problem-Solving & Project Management.
